channel.title: Diane Larlus's Personal Page
channel.description: Recent content on Diane Larlus's Personal Page

item.title: News
item.description: 2022 Paper accepted at CVPR22: On the Road to Online Adaptation for Semantic Image Segmentation 2 papers accepted at ICLR22 ARTEMIS: Attention-based Retrieval with Text-Explicit Matching and Implicit Similarity [paper] Learning Super-Features for Image Retrieval [paper,code] Co-organizing the Wiki-M3L workshop at ICLR22 Area Chair for CVPR22 2021 Paper accepted at 3DV21: NeuralDiff: Segmenting 3D objects that move in egocentric videos [paper, project page, video] Co-organizing the ImageNet Past, Present, Future workshop at NeurIPS21 Paper accepted at ICCV21: Concept Greneralization in visual representations [project page, video, code] Co-organizing of the PAISS Summer School 2021 (organized by MIAI, PRAIRIE and NAVER LABS Europe) Invited talk at the Women in Computer Vision (WiCV) Workshop at CVPR21 [Video] Invited talk at the ANITI research institute (scientific seminar) 2 papers accepted at CVPR21 Probabilistic Embeddings for Cross-Modal Retrieval [paper, code] Continual Adaptation of Visual Representations via Domain Randomization and Meta-learning (oral) [paper, project page] 2 papers accepted at WACV21 Unsupervised meta-domain adaptation for fashion retrieval [paper, code, video] StacMR: Scene-Text Aware Cross-Modal Retrieval [paper, code, video] Area Chair for CVPR21, MVA21, ICCV21, BMVC21 2020

item.title: Publications
item.description: ARTEMIS: Attention-based Retrieval with Text-Explicit Matching and Implicit Similarity. Ginger Delmas, Rafael Sampaio de Rezende, Gabriela Csurka, Diane Larlus. ICLR 2022 Learning Super-Features for Image Retrieval. Philippe Weinzaepfel, Thomas Lucas, Diane Larlus, Yannis Kalantidis. ICLR 2022 NeuralDiff: Segmenting 3D objects that move in egocentric videos. Vadim Tschernezki, Diane Larlus, Andrea Vedaldi. 3DV 2021 Probabilistic Embeddings for Cross-Modal Retrieval. Sanghyuk Chun, Seong Joon Oh, Rafael Sampaio de Rezende, Yannis Kalantidis, Diane Larlus.

item.title: Recent talks
item.description: Jan 2022 Invited talk at KUIS AI Meetings - Towards Semantic Understanding in Egocentric Videos Jun 2021 Invited talk at the Women in Computer Vision (WiCV) Workshop at CVPR21 - Lifelong visual representation learning [Video] May 2021 Invited talk at the ANITI research institute (scientific seminar) - Learning from weak supervision and mitigating catastrophic forgetting Oct 2020 Keynote Speaker for MIAI Days - Lifelong visual representation learning Aug 2020 Invited talk at the ILR Workshop at ECCV20 - From Instance-Level to Semantic Image Retrieval [Video] Nov 2019 Invited talk at the SOLARIS Workshop - Self-supervised learning for category-level geometry estimation Apr 2019 Invited talk at the StatLearn 19 conference - Learning Image Representations for Efficient Visual Search Nov 2018 Invited speaker, AI and Vision session at SophIA Summit - Visual Search Jul 2018 Lecture at the PRAIRIE Artificial Intelligence summer school (PAISS) [slides] - Visual Search Older: see CV

item.title: Teaching
item.description: Jan 2022 Guest lecture on Visual Search - Posts and Telecommunications Institute of Technology (PTIT), Vietnam 2021/2022 Comprendre des données visuelles à grande échelle - ENSIMAG, Grenoble May 2021 Guest lecture on Visual Search - Hanoi University of Science and Technology (HUST), Vietnam 2020/2021 Comprendre des données visuelles à grande échelle - ENSIMAG, Grenoble 2020 Découvrir l’IA par le jeu (Discover AI with games, a 2 day training session for high school teachers) - Maison pour la Science Alpes-Dauphiné Nov 2019 Lecture on Visual Search as part of the ‘Deep Learning’ course for the MVA master - ENS Paris 2019/2020 Comprendre des données visuelles à grande échelle - ENSIMAG, Grenoble Feb 2019 Lecture on Visual Search as part of the ‘Deep Learning in Practice’ course for the MVA master - ENS Paris 2018/2019 Comprendre des données visuelles à grande échelle - ENSIMAG, Grenoble July 2018 Lecture on Visual Search at the PRAIRIE Artificial Intelligence summer school (PAISS 2018) [slides] Older: see CV

item.title: News
item.description: 2019 Paper accepted at ICCV19: Fine-Grained Action Retrieval through Multiple Parts-of-Speech Embeddings [project page, video] Area Chair for ICCV19 Co-organizing the FFSS-USAD workshop at CVPR19 Invited talk at the StatLearn 19 conference 2018 Invited speaker, AI and Vision session at SophIA Summit 2018 Paper accepted at ECCV18: Semi-Convolutional Operators for Instance Segmentation [paper] Our work on Capturing the Geometry of Object Categories from Video Supervision has been accepted to TPAMI CVPR18 outstanding reviewer award Lecture about visual search at the PRAIRIE Artificial Intelligence summer school PAISS 2018 Paper accepted at CVPR18: Self-supervised Learning of Geometrically Stable Features Through Probabilistic Introspection (spotlight) [project page, video] Back to the Main Page
